item.title: 2021 Taliban offensive
item.description: The United States withdrew their troops from Afghanistan, allowing the Taliban to go on the offensive. As a result, the Afghanistan’s government was unable to maintain control, and the president ended up fleeing the country.

item.title: 401k
item.description: A retirement savings plan offered by many American employers that has tax advantages for the saver.

item.title: Baldur's Gate 3
item.description: wrote a short review Rating: 8/10 Immersive story and narration. Excellent worldbuilding and choice of actions and words actually significantly changes the story and the interaction between the character and the NPCs.

item.title: Bank Term Funding Program
item.description: Created to support American businesses and households by making additional funding available to eligible depository institutions to help assure banks have the ability to meet the needs of all their depositors.

item.title: Banking Is Broken How Blockchain Can Fix Bank Runs
item.description: On the banking system § Deposits to the bank are liabilities of the bank. Banks, however, lend these deposits out for interest which often have a maturity date.

item.title: Barney Frank
item.description: On the board of directors at Signature.

item.title: Bernie Madoff
item.description: American fraudster and financier who was the mastermind of the largest Ponzi scheme in history, worth about $64.8 billion. He was at one time chairman of the NASDAQ stock exchange.

item.title: Binance vs CFTC
item.description: Binance sued by Commodity Futures Trading Commission over alleged evasion of US rules, including encouraging VPN use for Americans to circumvent the IP block.
